message: I'm feeling generous, let's start with a good split.  What do you say?
Alice, let's be fair. I'm proposing a 60/40 split. Don't forget, inflation is eating away at our potential gains!
I understand your desire for fairness, Bob, but I think we can both do better.  Let's split it 70/30.  Inflation is a concern, but I'm confident we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. We're running out of time. A 50/50 split is the only fair option.  Let's not lose any more money to inflation!
